description: Self and Other is an examination through sounds of the relationship between people, place and time. Clustered around a theme, each episode uses music, field recordings, interviews, readings and more to create a tapestry of interconnected ideas and atmospheres that present the different faces of a story.

self-other-10th-march-2021.title: Self and Other: Conversations in the Smoke

self-other-12th-may-2020.title: Self and Other: The River Speaks

self-other-5th-january-2021.title: Self and Other: Missed of a Frozen Night

self-other-7th-may-2019.title: Self and Other: Visions Of The Future

title: Self and Other
